---

title: "stats"

description: "Show statistics about the cache"

---



## Usage

```bash
omni cache stats [OPTIONS]
```

---

## Options

### `-p`, `--project`

Filter the cache entries by project name, accepts glob patterns

- **Required:** No

### `-t`, `--task`

Filter the cache entries by task name, accepts glob patterns

- **Required:** No

---

## Examples

```bash
omni cache stats [OPTIONS]
```

---
